title: Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF Streak Continues With Massive Net Inflows: Weekly Recap
body: US investors continued to pour money into the spot Bitcoin ETFs after Donald Trump‚Äôs victory in the presidential elections, and the streak extended into the past five trading days. The Ethereum counterparts have also enjoyed the momentum by attracting almost a billion dollars within the past week. BTC ETFs Keep the Momentum Going The initial 11 and now 12 spot Bitcoin ETFs have already broken several records in terms of massive net inflows in their first year. This is particularly true for BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT, which quickly became the largest of the bunch and continues to be the favorite among investors. The past five trading days solidified the recent trend that started even before the elections. On Monday, December 9, the funds attracted $489.1 million in net inflows, followed by $438.5 million on Tuesday, $223.1 million on Wednesday, $597.5 million on Thursday, and $428.9 million on Friday, finishing the week strong. Overall, the total numbers for this period shot up to $2,167.1 billion. Although it is lower than last week‚Äôs, it still means that more than $2 billion has been poured into the ETFs within just several days. IBIT led the charge during four of the trading days, with $394.1 million on Monday, $295.6 million on Tuesday, $431.6 million on Thursday, and $393 million on Friday. It saw no reportable flows on Wednesday, while Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC stood out with $121.9 million on that day. These substantial net inflows have positively impacted BTC‚Äôs price as the asset is up by 3% on a weekly scale and sits close to a new all-time high. ETH ETFs Are Doing Well, too The Ethereum ETFs have also enjoyed the past several weeks following their sluggish start. Their streak began even further back‚Äîon November 22‚Äîand they have yet to see a day in the red since. Once again, they recorded impressive numbers in the past week, attracting $149.8 million on Monday, $305.7 million on Tuesday, $102 million on Wednesday, $273.7 million on Thursday, and a more modest $23.6 million on Friday. The total now stands at $854.8 million. Interestingly, ETH‚Äôs price is actually down on a weekly scale by 2.5%. The asset jumped above $4,000 during the previous Friday but has been unable to maintain its momentum and now sits below $3,900 following a turbulent week. The post Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF Streak Continues With Massive Net Inflows: Weekly Recap appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: 4 Cryptos Similar to Solana (SOL) But Cheaper and Ready for Bigger Profits
body: Solana (SOL) has earned a reputation as a high-performance blockchain, attracting investors with its speed, scalability, and low transaction costs. However, its price tag can make it inaccessible to those seeking budget-friendly opportunities with similar growth potential. The hunt for alternatives that offer comparable performance at a more affordable price is on the rise. Emerging projects like Lightchain AI , Avalanche (AVAX), Cardano (ADA), and Fantom (FTM) are making waves as cost-effective options poised for significant growth. Among them, Lightchain AI stands out with its presale price of just $0.003, offering investors an unprecedented entry point into a revolutionary blockchain platform that integrates artificial intelligence for unparalleled innovation. What Makes Solana (SOL) a Benchmark for Emerging Cryptos? Solana‚Äôs ability to process thousands of transactions per second (TPS) with minimal fees has set a high standard for emerging cryptocurrencies. Its Proof of History (PoH) consensus mechanism enables rapid transaction verification, making it ideal for decentralized applications (dApps) and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). The platform‚Äôs scalability and developer-friendly ecosystem have solidified its position as a leader in blockchain technology. However, challenges like periodic outages and rising costs highlight the need for newer projects that can deliver similar capabilities without these drawbacks. This is where alternatives like Lightchain AI and others come into play, offering investors similar benefits with unique enhancements. Lightchain AI Affordable Powerhouse with Advanced Technology Lightchain AI is redefining blockchain innovation with its integration of artificial intelligence and decentralized technology. Priced at just $0.003 during its presale, it offers a low-cost entry into a platform designed for scalability, transparency, and efficiency. Lightchain AI‚Äôs standout features include its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism, which rewards nodes for performing valuable AI computations, and its Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM), enabling seamless execution of AI-powered applications. These advancements position Lightchain AI as a game-changer in industries such as healthcare, logistics, and decentralized finance (DeFi). For investors, Lightchain AI represents an affordable yet powerful alternative to Solana, with the added advantage of being at the forefront of blockchain-AI convergence. Avalanche (AVAX) High-Performance Blockchain with Growth Potential Avalanche (AVAX) is a prominent contender for those searching for Solana-like cryptocurrencies. Renowned for its impressive transaction speeds and sub-second finality, Avalanche has carved a niche as a reliable platform catering to DeFi, gaming, and a variety of enterprise applications. Its innovative Avalanche Consensus protocol ensures scalability without sacrificing decentralization, making it highly attractive to both developers and users. What sets Avalanche apart is its ability to handle a high transaction throughput while maintaining reliability across its ecosystem. This unique combination of speed, scalability, and decentralization has made it a go-to choice for projects requiring robust and efficient blockchain infrastructure. Although AVAX is priced higher than Lightchain AI, its strong technical foundation and versatile use cases make it an appealing option for those looking to strike the right balance between cost and performance. Cardano (ADA) Strong Development Focus Cardano (ADA) has established itself as a favorite among investors seeking a robust, innovative, and affordable blockchain platform. Known for its strong focus on sustainability, scalability, and interoperability, Cardano continues to solidify its position as a key player in the ever-evolving crypto space. At the heart of Cardano‚Äôs success is its Ouroboros Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which combines energy efficiency with high-level security, addressing two of the most pressing concerns in the blockchain industry. This approach not only ensures a more sustainable network but also allows for faster transactions without compromising on safety or reliability. What sets Cardano apart is its continuous evolution. Backed by a dedicated team of researchers, developers, and engineers, the platform is designed to adapt to the rapidly changing demands of the market. Its methodical and research-driven approach ensures that it remains relevant in an increasingly competitive industry. Fantom (FTM) Speed and Efficiency at a Lower Price Point Fantom (FTM) is rapidly gaining attention for its fast, efficient, and highly cost-effective blockchain solutions. At the heart of Fantom‚Äôs technology is its innovative Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) architecture, which enables high throughput and near-instant transaction finality. This unique design makes Fantom ideal for a wide variety of applications, from decentralized finance (DeFi) to supply chain management and beyond. What sets Fantom apart is its Lachesis consensus algorithm, designed to enhance security, scalability, and performance. By addressing key limitations of earlier blockchain systems, Fantom offers a robust and reliable foundation for developers and users alike. Its affordability, coupled with a focus on real-world use cases, positions Fantom as a strong competitor to Solana, particularly for budget-conscious investors seeking an efficient yet versatile blockchain platform. Whether you're a developer, investor, or user, Fantom is proving to be a compelling choice in the evolving blockchain landscape. Why Lightchain AI Outshines Solana and Its Cheaper Alternatives Innovative Technology: Lightchain AI‚Äôs integration of AI and blockchain through PoI and AIVM sets it apart from other platforms. Cost Efficiency: With a presale price of $0.003, Lightchain AI offers an unparalleled entry point for investors. Scalability and Sustainability: The platform addresses scalability challenges while minimizing energy consumption, ensuring long-term viability. Real-World Applications: Lightchain AI‚Äôs focus on industries like healthcare and logistics broadens its appeal beyond traditional blockchain use cases. Early Adoption Advantage: Being in its presale phase, Lightchain AI provides investors with the opportunity to capitalize on its growth potential from the ground up. Investing Smartly in Emerging Cryptos for Bigger Profits The search for high-growth alternatives to Solana has led to a range of promising options, including Lightchain AI, Avalanche, Cardano, and Fantom. Among these, Lightchain AI stands out as a revolutionary project that combines affordability with advanced technology. By investing in Lightchain AI during its presale phase, investors can secure a stake in a platform poised for exponential growth. As the crypto market continues to evolve, identifying projects with unique value propositions and strong growth potential is key to achieving significant returns. With its groundbreaking features and low entry price, Lightchain AI is well-positioned to lead the next wave of blockchain innovation. title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: Russia Contemplates Bitcoin Reserve, BlackRock Buys ETH, & More
body: This week, we saw Russia and Texas exploring the creation of strategic Bitcoin reserves. At the same time, regulatory advancements include Ripple Labs gaining NYDFS approval for its stablecoin and the Czech Republic planning to simplify crypto tax laws. Let‚Äôs dig deeper. Bitcoin The Texas House of Representatives introduced legislation to establish a strategic Bitcoin reserve that could act as a proving ground for the US Treasury. Microsoft shareholders have rejected a proposal for the company to explore making Bitcoin (BTC) part of the company‚Äôs investment strategy. The rejection comes despite a strong push by MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor to convince shareholders. Anton Tkachev, a State Duma deputy from the New People party, has formally proposed establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve (SBR) amid the asset‚Äôs growing popularity. Ethereum BlackRock and Fidelity, two of the largest exchange-traded fund (ETF) issuers, have purchased over $500 million worth of ETH over the past two days. Altcoins Despite Shiba Inu's promise, there are better cryptocurrencies in the market whose fundamentals are more robust and whose tokenomics are more convincing: Rexas Finance (RXS), Avalanche (AVAX), and Polkadot (DOT). Grayscale Investments has formally registered with the NYSE to turn its current Solana Trust into a Solana Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF). Rumors are swirling that Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse is secretly investing in DTX Exchange (DTX), an up-and-coming player about to change digital asset trading. title: China reveals plans to clean up AI content distorting classic literature and ideologies
body: China has embarked on a crackdown on some AI-generated content due to fears it might undermine and endanger Chinese classical literature and its leading ideologies. This also follows a rise in generative AI particularly the spread of meme culture, which, although humorous, has been found to play a big role in shaping cultural ideas. Beijing argues that AI‚Äôs adaptations from its Chinese classic television dramas and literature are ‚Äúhighly deceptive.‚Äù Some parents also agree and are concerned that AI-made jokes might lead to a loss of respect for traditional classics. China calls for a clean-up of AI-made jokes According to SCMP , memes have been cited as one of the ‚Äúkey culprits‚Äù the Chinese authorities have cited recognized as risks to its ideologies and culture. Like memes, edited video clips primarily made for humor and social media traction have also proven to be part of China‚Äôs challenges in regulating AI. The SCMP revealed that the agency that oversees state broadcasting ‚Äì the National Radio and Television Administration (NRTA) last week issued a notice calling on its supervisory bodies to ‚Äúclean up‚Äù all such videos that use AI to make caricatures of Chinese culture . The broadcast watchdog noted the increasing trend of altering video clips from shows including Dream of the Red Chamber and Journey to the West. These shows are based on novels that have been hailed as some of the greatest works of Chinese literature. The NRTA added these AI-generated jokes ‚Äúseek to gain traffic without boundaries and disrespect classic intellectual properties.‚Äù It added that these videos also go against the spirit of original works and might constitute copyright infringement. According to the broadcast watchdog, the videos also challenge traditional cultural perceptions. The country‚Äôs top internet watchdog ‚Äì Cyberspace Administration of China, has also repeatedly made calls to clean up video content that could be harmful to the young. These calls also align with China‚Äôs ongoing campaigns to control online misinformation as well as clean up information not suitable or contrary to traditional values. Social media platforms in China still carry the implicated videos Largely characterized by humor and sarcastic tone, the AI-remastered videos can still be found on Chinese social media platforms. Some of the videos are clearly labelled as AI-generated while others are not. In one of the said videos, characters from the show, Journey to the West are featured happily riding motorcycles on their arduous journey. The show is based on a 16th-century novel about a Buddhist monk on a journey to India in the seventh century. Beijing-based lawyer Gu Yu said that while these videos did not cause much harm to the public, they could also influence people unfamiliar with the original works. ‚ÄúWhile new technologies should be approached with a degree of tolerance to encourage public innovation, it is also crucial to take action against works that distort basic values.‚Äù ‚Äì Yu However, Yu highlighted that China‚Äôs AI regulation is still in an ‚Äúexploratory phase,‚Äù with regulation and lawmaking lagging behind technological advances. Yu also maintains that without sufficient legal precedents, it might be challenging to create comprehensive laws. Measures are, therefore, introduced when problems arise. Policing AI content might be a challenge for China According to SCMP, the NRTA notice is a clear indication of one of the latest challenges the Asian economy faces in AI governance. The country is in a fix trying to strike a balance between using the technology to optimize operations and boost the economy while also trying to tackle the adverse impacts of AI, such as the spread of deepfakes and misinformation. It also has to deal with handling its potential impact on public perception. In China, traditional culture is critical to the Communist Party‚Äôs governance philosophy. It sees this as part of its cultural reconstruction campaign. The country has made several efforts to regulate AI technology including its ‚Äú Administrative Provisions on Deep Synthesis in internet-based Information Services ,‚Äù which was implemented in January last year. This requires labeling content that might mislead or confuse the public. Last year, China also took some measures to regulate generative AI services and issued guidelines for multimedia content labeling standards. Some Chinese nationals support regulating the sector and cleaning up AI videos from state broadcasters. The NRTA‚Äôs request to clean up AI-remastered videos was a trending topic over the past week and ignited discussions on the social media platform Weibo microblog, attracting more than 43.4 million views and over 14,000 discussions. Some argued that without oversight, such content could lead to serious ‚Äúinformation pollution.‚Äù They argued that young children in junior school who have not yet read the Four Great Chinese Classical Novels are already exposed to funny videos of the Monkey King fighting with Jia Baoyu. Monkey King and Jia Baoyu are the protagonists in Journey to the West and Dream of the Red Chamber respectively. Other online commentators have different opinions, arguing officials are ‚Äúoverseeing too much‚Äù limiting people‚Äôs freedom to enjoy ‚Äúentertaining videos.‚Äù From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

title: 3 Penny Cryptos to Buy Now Before They Breach $1 Psychological Level
body: Penny cryptocurrencies, often overlooked in the broader market, hold tremendous potential for investors seeking exponential returns. These digital assets, priced below $1, provide a low entry point and significant upside as they approach key psychological price thresholds. The $1 barrier often marks a critical milestone in a token's journey, triggering widespread attention, increased adoption, and a surge in market value. While investing in penny cryptos requires careful analysis and strategy, they present a unique chance to get in early on projects poised for rapid growth. Among the standout contenders, Lightchain AI offers unparalleled innovation, positioning itself as a leader in the next wave of crypto evolution. For investors ready to seize the opportunity, penny cryptos offer a gateway to potentially life-changing gains. The Significance of the $1 Psychological Barrier in Crypto Markets In the world of cryptocurrencies, the $1 price point carries significant psychological weight. It symbolizes a project's transition from obscurity to recognition, often accompanied by increased trading volumes and a broader investor base. Breaking this barrier can drive media attention and heightened market sentiment, further propelling prices upward. For tokens currently priced below $1, the journey to surpass this threshold often reflects the maturity and adoption of the underlying project. However, not all penny cryptos are created equal‚Äîonly those with robust technology, clear use cases, and strong market positioning are likely to make this leap. Understanding the dynamics of this critical price point helps investors identify which projects are worth considering for long-term growth. Lightchain AI Intelligent Investment Lightchain AI ($LCAI) is a trailblazer in the world of penny cryptocurrencies, offering a blend of blockchain and artificial intelligence (AI) that redefines industry standards. With its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism, Lightchain AI rewards nodes for performing valuable AI computations, ensuring that the network contributes to real-world advancements. The Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) takes smart contracts to the next level, enabling efficient execution of AI-specific tasks. What sets Lightchain AI apart is its practical applications across diverse industries, from healthcare and logistics to finance. By addressing challenges like scalability, privacy, and decentralization, it delivers a sustainable and future-proof platform for global use. As Lightchain AI continues to gain traction through its exclusive presale, early investors have a unique opportunity to participate in a groundbreaking project before it reaches the $1 milestone. Avalanche Empowering Decentralized Finance (DeFi) With the rise in popularity of DeFi, scalability and transaction speed have become critical concerns. Avalanche ($AVAX), a platform for launching decentralized applications, addresses these issues with its high-performance blockchain architecture. With a unique consensus mechanism combining proof-of-stake (PoS) and Byzantine Fault Tolerance (BFT), Avalanche can process 4,500 transactions per second while supporting smart contracts. This makes it a highly competitive solution for DeFi projects seeking to scale efficiently. As demand for DeFi solutions continues to grow, Avalanche is positioned to become a go-to platform for developers and users. With its recent launch and strong partnerships with major players in the industry, Avalanche has already surpassed the $1 price mark, but it remains a promising penny crypto to watch as it continues its journey towards mainstream adoption. VeChain (VET) Practical Applications VeChain (VET) has steadily established itself as a leader in blockchain-based supply chain solutions. Its dual-token system, featuring VET and VTHO, supports efficient and transparent tracking of goods from production to delivery. With partnerships across industries such as luxury goods, healthcare, and logistics, VeChain demonstrates real-world utility that drives long-term adoption. The token's low price point, combined with its expanding network of collaborators, positions it as an attractive investment for those seeking practical applications of blockchain technology. As VeChain continues to grow its ecosystem and gain institutional backing, it stands as a strong candidate to surpass the $1 threshold, offering both stability and growth potential for investors. Key Strengths of These Penny Cryptos Lightchain AI ($LCAI): Revolutionary Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus. AI-driven applications for diverse industries. Strong focus on scalability, privacy, and decentralization. Positioned for exponential growth through presale opportunities. Dogwifhat (WIF): Operates on Solana‚Äôs high-speed, cost-efficient blockchain. Combines community-driven appeal with real-world utility. High throughput supports payment solutions and decentralized applications. VeChain (VET): Proven use cases in supply chain management. Dual-token system ensures efficiency and transparency. Strategic partnerships drive adoption across industries. Why Lightchain AI Outshines Its Rivals and Leads the Pack While Dogwifhat and VeChain offer unique strengths, Lightchain AI stands out as the most promising investment among these penny cryptos. Its innovative approach to integrating AI with blockchain technology addresses critical challenges in both fields, from scalability to governance. The introduction of the AIVM enables advanced applications, making Lightchain AI a pioneer in decentralized intelligence. Additionally, its ongoing presale provides an early entry point for investors, ensuring significant upside as the project gains momentum. With its robust infrastructure, visionary leadership, and focus on sustainability, Lightchain AI is uniquely positioned to lead the next wave of blockchain innovation. Investing Smartly Before the $1 Breakthrough For investors seeking high-growth opportunities, penny cryptocurrencies like Lightchain AI, Dogwifhat, and VeChain present compelling cases. However, among these contenders, Lightchain AI emerges as the leader, offering a blend of cutting-edge technology and real-world applications that surpass its peers. By investing early in projects with robust fundamentals and strong market positioning, investors can maximize returns while diversifying their portfolios. As these tokens approach the $1 psychological barrier, the potential for exponential growth makes now the ideal time to take action. üëâ Visit the Lightchain AI Website üëâ Read the Lightchain AI Whitepaper üëâ Follow Lightchain AI on Twitter/X üëâ Join the Lightchain AI Community on Telegram Disclaimer: This is a sponsored article and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice

title: Singapore Leads Asia‚Äôs Crypto Boom Amid Bitcoin Surge
body: The post Singapore Leads Asia‚Äôs Crypto Boom Amid Bitcoin Surge appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bitcoin‚Äôs surge past $100,000 is boosting Singapore‚Äôs crypto ambitions. Known for its crypto-friendly policies, the country leads Asia in digital asset adoption, with firms like Coinbase and Ripple licensed to operate. Despite setbacks from Terra and FTX collapses, Singapore‚Äôs infrastructure and investor interest remain strong. Around 40% of Singaporeans hold crypto, fueled by global ETF approvals. However, the Monetary Authority of Singapore stays cautious, restricting retail access to spot ETFs. As optimism grows, 2025 could solidify Singapore‚Äôs crypto dominance, especially with potential U.S. policy shifts under Donald Trump‚Äôs pro-Bitcoin stance.

title: Trump‚Äôs WLFI Spends $44M in Crypto, Gains $2.33M Profit
body: The post Trump‚Äôs WLFI Spends $44M in Crypto, Gains $2.33M Profit appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News On December 15, Arkham Intelligence reported that World Liberty Financial (WLFI), the Trump family‚Äôs crypto project, spent $500,013 USDC to acquire 509,955 ENA at $0.981 each. This investment underscores WLFI‚Äôs expanding influence in the crypto market. Since November 31, the project has invested $44.41 million across five assets: 8,105 ETH worth $30 million (profit: $1.29M), 102.9 cbBTC valued at $10 million (profit: $410K), 78,387 LINK for $2 million (profit: $290K), 5,886 AAVE at $1.91 million (profit: $252K), and 509,955 ENA (profit: $81.3K).

title: Drake‚Äôs X Account Hacked to Promote $5M Crypto Scam
body: The post Drake‚Äôs X Account Hacked to Promote $5M Crypto Scam appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News On Saturday night, rapper Drake‚Äôs X account was reportedly hacked to promote a fraudulent Solana-based memecoin called ‚Äú$ANITA,‚Äù inspired by his cartoon alter ego, Anita Max Wynn. The posts, falsely claiming a partnership with Stake, Drake‚Äôs crypto betting platform, reached over 39 million followers. The scam drove $5 million in trading volume before users realized its fraudulent nature. The posts were later removed. This incident follows a string of high-profile X account hacks targeting celebrities like Cardi B and Doja Cat, used to promote similar crypto scams.

title: Ethereum's Market Dominance vs. Lightchain AI's Emerging Potential‚ÄîAn In-Depth Comparison
body: Ethereum has long been the cornerstone of the blockchain world, celebrated for its smart contract functionality and pioneering role in decentralized finance (DeFi) and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Its dominance has solidified its place as a market leader, driving countless innovations in the crypto space. However, the emergence of Lightchain AI ($LCAI) is sparking conversations about what the next chapter of blockchain evolution might look like. Lightchain AI , with its groundbreaking Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism and Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM), offers a fresh perspective on how blockchain can integrate real-world utility with advanced computational capabilities. As Ethereum battles its scalability challenges and rising competition, Lightchain AI is positioning itself as a revolutionary alternative with the potential to redefine the industry. Ethereum‚Äôs Market Dominance Power of First-Mover Advantage Since its launch in 2015, Ethereum has established itself as the go-to blockchain for developers and enterprises. Its smart contract capabilities revolutionized the creation of decentralized applications (dApps), paving the way for entire ecosystems in DeFi, gaming, and NFTs. Ethereum‚Äôs dominance can be attributed to several factors. Its massive developer ecosystem continuously improves and builds on the platform, while its early start created strong network effects, giving it a significant user base and liquidity advantage. Additionally, enterprises and institutions have widely adopted Ethereum for its reliability and established utility. However, Ethereum‚Äôs first-mover advantage also comes with challenges. The platform faces issues such as high gas fees, network congestion, and slower transaction speeds. These limitations have opened the door for newer platforms, like Lightchain AI, to disrupt the market with more efficient and scalable solutions. Lightchain AI New Paradigm in Blockchain Technology While Ethereum‚Äôs dominance stems from its smart contract capabilities, **Lightchain AI** is redefining blockchain innovation by integrating artificial intelligence (AI) with decentralized technology. This powerful combination opens up new possibilities, including intelligent decision-making and improved computational efficiency. Lightchain AI introduces several groundbreaking features. Its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism rewards nodes for performing AI tasks like model training and optimization, ensuring computational power directly contributes to real-world advancements, unlike Ethereum‚Äôs Proof of Stake (PoS). The Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) is a specialized virtual machine designed for AI-specific tasks, allowing developers to execute complex AI operations effortlessly. Additionally, Lightchain AI‚Äôs scalable architecture tackles scalability issues from the outset, delivering high-speed transactions without the bottlenecks often experienced on Ethereum‚Äôs network. With a presale price of just $0.003 per token, Lightchain AI is quickly gaining attention as a high-potential project that blends cutting-edge innovation with practical utility. Comparing Core Features: Smart Contracts vs. Proof of Intelligence Ethereum‚Äôs standout feature is its smart contract functionality, which powers decentralized applications and services. These self-executing contracts have become essential to industries ranging from finance to gaming. However, beyond this innovation, Ethereum‚Äôs consensus mechanisms and transaction processing have seen little change. In contrast, Lightchain AI introduces Proof of Intelligence (PoI), a revolutionary approach that redefines the role of blockchain nodes by prioritizing meaningful computations. While Ethereum‚Äôs smart contracts enable automation, they come with high gas fees and lack specialized AI capabilities. Lightchain AI‚Äôs PoI, on the other hand, rewards nodes for performing valuable AI computations, combining network security with real-world utility. By integrating AI into its blockchain infrastructure, Lightchain AI pushes blockchain technology to meet the demands of modern computation. How Lightchain AI Challenges Ethereum Scalability continues to be Ethereum‚Äôs Achilles‚Äô heel. Despite the Ethereum 2.0 upgrade and its transition to Proof of Stake, issues like network congestion and high transaction fees persist, limiting its growth. With a processing capacity of about 15 transactions per second (TPS), Ethereum falls significantly behind faster competitors like Solana and Polygon. Lightchain AI, however, is designed to address these limitations. Its efficient consensus mechanism, PoI, directs computational power toward AI-specific tasks, ensuring high throughput. The platform‚Äôs AIVM architecture enables dynamic scalability, allowing it to handle intensive workloads and support real-time applications. Additionally, its cost-effective structure ensures lower fees, removing many of the barriers Ethereum faces in adoption. These advancements position Lightchain AI as a forward-looking blockchain platform, ready to meet the growing demands of decentralized ecosystems. Established Utility vs. Emerging Potential Ethereum‚Äôs widespread adoption across various sectors has established it as a reliable blockchain for numerous use cases. In the realm of DeFi, it powers over 70% of platforms, including major players like Uniswap and Aave. It also dominates the NFT space, hosting the largest marketplaces such as OpenSea. Beyond this, Ethereum is widely used for enterprise solutions, including supply chain tracking, tokenization, and more. However, Lightchain AI brings a unique advantage with its focus on AI integration to tackle modern challenges. It enables decentralized AI workloads, supporting industries like healthcare and logistics through AI training and inference. Lightchain AI also facilitates the creation of intelligent decentralized applications (smart dApps) that can adapt and learn in real time. Additionally, its scalable solutions provide a robust platform for high-performance AI models, unlocking new opportunities across various sectors. As industries increasingly prioritize AI-driven solutions, Lightchain AI‚Äôs innovative use cases position it as a strong competitor to Ethereum‚Äôs established legacy. Why Lightchain AI Could Redefine Market Leadership in the Long Term The blockchain industry is evolving rapidly, and platforms that address scalability, sustainability, and utility will define its future. Lightchain AI is uniquely positioned to lead this transformation through: Technological Innovation: PoI and AIVM introduce capabilities that Ethereum and other blockchains lack. Market Timing: With its presale priced at $0.003, early adopters have an opportunity for substantial returns. Real-World Impact: By aligning blockchain with AI, Lightchain AI delivers solutions that directly address global challenges. Community-Driven Growth: Decentralized governance ensures that Lightchain AI evolves to meet user needs, fostering trust and adoption. These factors not only set Lightchain AI apart but also establish it as a blockchain capable of reshaping the market landscape. Ethereum‚Äôs Market Position and Lightchain AI‚Äôs Path to Disruption Ethereum‚Äôs dominance is a testament to its role as a blockchain pioneer, but its limitations have opened the door for innovative challengers. Lightchain AI , with its Proof of Intelligence and AI Virtual Machine, offers a transformative approach to blockchain technology that could redefine the industry. While Ethereum‚Äôs legacy ensures its continued relevance, Lightchain AI‚Äôs groundbreaking innovations and real-world applications make it a strong contender for long-term market leadership. For investors and developers seeking a platform built for the future, Lightchain AI presents a compelling opportunity to participate in the next phase of blockchain evolution. title: Why Ethena is pumping: Could it surge by 35%?
body: Ethena maintained a strong comeback as its assets jumped to a record high on the heels of President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs World Liberty Financial (WLFI) buying the token. Ethena ( ENA ) token jumped to a high of $1.20, its highest level since April 14, and 525% above its lowest level this year. This rally has pushed its market cap to over $3.36 billion. Ethena soared after World Liberty Financial accumulated 509,955 ENA tokens valued at over $589,000.¬†The company, which raised over $72 million in a token sale, also owns Ethereum ( ETH ), CBBTC, Tether, USD Coin Chainlink, and AAVE (per Nansen data). WLFI is backed by Justin Sun, the founder of Tron (TRX). You might also like: Trump‚Äôs World Liberty Financial bags $55M in ETH holding; sparks positivity for SOL and LNEX Ethena also jumped after the total value locked in its ecosystem jumped. According to DeFi Llama, its total value locked jumped to over $5.84 billion. This growth has made USDe, its yield-earning stablecoin the third-biggest one after Tether and USDC. Its valuation has jumped by over 83% in the last 30 days. ENA price has also rallied as odds that the USDe stablecoin will de-peg in 2024 fell. According to Polymarket , there is just a 2% chance that the token will drop below 90 cents as Terra USD did in 2022. There have been concerns about USDe since, like UST, it is not backed by any fiat currencies. Instead, it is an algorithmic coin that pays a 27% yield, while its peg is maintained by hedging the delta of spot assets during mining. Ethena price analysis: can it hit an all-time high? Ethena price chart | Source: crypto.news The daily chart shows that the ENA price has been in a strong bullish trend in the past few months. It has rallied from a low of $0.20 in September to $1.2, its highest level since April. The coin has remained above the 50-day and 25-day Exponential Moving Averages, a sign that bulls are in control. Ethena is also forming what looks like a cup and handle chart pattern whose upper side is at $1.5210. A C&H is a popular continuation sign. Therefore, the coin will likely continue rising as bulls target $1.5210, which is about 33% above the current level. A drop below the support at $0.90 will invalidate the bullish view. Read more: Happy Cat, Hyperliquid, Virtuals lead as Bitcoin steadies above $100k

title: 3 Cryptocurrencies to Choose Over Bitcoin (BTC) Right Now
body: Bitcoin (BTC) has long been the flagship cryptocurrency, celebrated for its role in introducing blockchain technology to the world. However, as the crypto market evolves, new opportunities are emerging, offering innovative features and higher growth potential. For investors seeking alternatives to Bitcoin, projects like Lightchain AI , Ethereum (ETH), and Solana (SOL) are leading the charge with unique technologies and expanding ecosystems. Among these, Lightchain AI stands out as a revolutionary platform that integrates artificial intelligence with blockchain, making it an exciting option for forward-thinking investors. Currently in its Presale phase at an accessible price of $0.003, Lightchain AI offers an unparalleled entry point into the future of decentralized intelligence. This article explores why these three cryptocurrencies are excellent alternatives to Bitcoin and how they excel in growth potential and utility. Why Bitcoin May Not Be the Best Choice for Growth-Oriented Investors Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance in the cryptocurrency market has made it a go-to asset for many investors, but its limitations are becoming increasingly apparent. As a store of value, Bitcoin excels, but its utility is limited compared to newer blockchain projects. High transaction fees, slow processing times, and lack of scalability hinder its ability to compete with platforms designed for smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and advanced computations. For growth-oriented investors, Bitcoin‚Äôs maturity means lower potential for exponential gains. Emerging projects like Lightchain AI, Ethereum, and Solana, with their focus on innovation and real-world applications, offer far greater opportunities for significant returns. These cryptocurrencies not only address Bitcoin‚Äôs limitations but also bring unique value propositions that make them more adaptable to the evolving demands of the blockchain ecosystem. Lightchain AI High-Potential Crypto with Revolutionary Features Lightchain AI is redefining blockchain technology by merging it with artificial intelligence to create a decentralized ecosystem capable of addressing real-world challenges. At the core of its innovation is the Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism, which rewards nodes for performing valuable AI computations. This ensures that computational resources are utilized for meaningful purposes, setting it apart from traditional consensus methods like Bitcoin‚Äôs energy-intensive Proof of Work (PoW). The Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) is another groundbreaking feature of Lightchain AI, enabling scalable, privacy-preserving AI applications. Industries like healthcare, finance, and logistics are already recognizing the potential of integrating blockchain and AI, making Lightchain AI a leader in this emerging space. With its Presale phase offering tokens at $0.003, it provides a rare opportunity to invest early in a project poised for transformative impact. Ethereum (ETH) The Pioneer of Smart Contract Technology Ethereum (ETH) is the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization and a pioneer in blockchain innovation. Its introduction of smart contracts revolutionized the industry, enabling the development of dApps and decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms. Unlike Bitcoin, which functions primarily as a store of value, Ethereum serves as the foundation for a wide range of applications, from NFTs to DeFi protocols. Ethereum‚Äôs ongoing transition to Ethereum 2.0, which includes a shift from PoW to Proof of Stake (PoS), addresses scalability and energy efficiency issues, further strengthening its position as a top blockchain platform. While Ethereum has matured significantly, its continuous innovation ensures it remains a compelling choice for investors seeking utility and long-term growth potential. Solana (SOL) Speed, Scalability, and Growing Adoption Solana (SOL) has emerged as one of the fastest-growing blockchain platforms, known for its unparalleled transaction speed and low fees. With a high throughput of up to 65,000 transactions per second, Solana has become a preferred choice for developers building DeFi applications, NFT marketplaces, and other dApps. Its focus on scalability and energy efficiency allows it to compete directly with Ethereum while offering unique advantages. Solana‚Äôs rapidly expanding ecosystem and adoption by major projects make it a strong contender in the cryptocurrency market. Its innovative architecture addresses some of the critical limitations of both Bitcoin and Ethereum, making it an attractive alternative for investors seeking high-performance blockchain solutions. How These Cryptos Outperform Bitcoin in Utility and Growth Potential Utility and Adaptability: Lightchain AI, Ethereum, and Solana excel over Bitcoin due to their broader functionality. Unlike Bitcoin, which primarily serves as a store of value, these platforms enable developers, enterprises, and industries to create and run decentralized applications (dApps). AI Integration: Lightchain AI stands out by incorporating artificial intelligence, addressing the growing need for intelligent and scalable blockchain solutions. Smart Contracts (Ethereum): Ethereum‚Äôs smart contract capabilities make it a popular choice for building dApps, attracting a large number of developers and users. Speed and Scalability (Solana): Solana‚Äôs focus on high-speed transactions and scalability gives it a strong appeal, particularly for projects that require fast, efficient solutions. Dynamic Investments: The advanced features and adaptability of these platforms drive higher adoption rates, increasing their long-term value. In contrast, Bitcoin remains limited to its static role as digital gold. Why Lightchain AI Leads the Pack as the Top Choice Over Bitcoin Among the three, Lightchain AI stands out as the most innovative and high-potential project. Its integration of AI with blockchain through features like the PoI mechanism and AIVM addresses critical challenges such as scalability, privacy, and meaningful network utilization. Lightchain AI‚Äôs commitment to democratizing AI development and fostering inclusivity ensures it aligns with the future of decentralized technology. Additionally, Lightchain AI‚Äôs Presale phase at $0.003 offers a unique entry point for investors looking to get in early on a transformative project. Unlike Bitcoin, which has limited room for growth, Lightchain AI is just beginning its journey, with a roadmap that includes ecosystem expansion, cross-chain integration, and global adoption. These attributes make it a top choice for investors seeking exponential returns. Diversifying Your Portfolio with the Right Alternatives As the cryptocurrency market evolves, it‚Äôs clear that projects like Lightchain AI, Ethereum, and Solana offer far greater growth potential and utility than Bitcoin. While Bitcoin remains a solid store of value, these innovative platforms address critical challenges and open new possibilities for blockchain technology. Among them, Lightchain AI leads the way with its revolutionary integration of AI and blockchain, making it a compelling choice for forward-thinking investors. By diversifying your portfolio with these high-potential cryptocurrencies, you position yourself to capitalize on the future of decentralized technology. title: Helium price could enter beast mode, technicals suggest
body: Helium, the biggest player in Decentralized Public Infrastructure, rose for three consecutive days. Helium ( HNT ) jumped to the crucial resistance level at $9.520 on Sunday, Dec. 15 as the recent rally gained steam. It has soared by 228% from its August lows, pushing its valuation to $1.6 billion. Helium‚Äôs rally happened as data from the futures market showed that open interest was in a strong uptrend. According to CoinGlass , the interest rose to over $11 million on Sunday, up from last week‚Äôs low of $9.35 million. Most of this interest was in Bitget and OKX. You might also like: Dogecoin vs Ripple: December‚Äôs best buy, and how each compares to Lightchain AI Helium open interest Open interest is an important metric that looks at the number of unfilled call and put orders in the futures market. The metric often rises when an asset is seeing strong demand. Another likely catalyst for the token is that the number of burned HNT tokens has continued rising in the past few months. A recent report by Messari showed that the number of HNT burned in November stood at over $250,000. HNT is usually burned to access data credits to use the network. DePIN demand is accelerating. Leading High-P DePIN networks are seeing steady growth and tracking towards all-time highs in December. ‚Äì @Hivemapper ‚Äî $HONEY is burned for map data usage. ‚Äì @GEODNET_ ‚Äî $GEOD is burned for location correction data usage. ‚Äì @helium ‚Äî $HNT is‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/OcRU2bRMdD ‚Äî Nick Garcia (@NickDGarcia) December 13, 2024 Helium‚Äôs rally accelerated after the community members voted for the HIP 139. The proposal called for the phasing out of rewards for Citizen Broadband Radio Service on the Helium Network. After that, Nova Labs will assist CBRS transition by re-flashing their equipment to stock firmware. The decision affected about 4,000 CBRS holders. Helium price analysis HNT price chart | Source: crypto.news The daily chart shows that the HNT price has done well as it jumped from $5.22 earlier this month to $9.52 today. This was an important price since it failed to move above it on Dec. 2 and Dec. 7. It is also slightly above the key support at $8.667, its highest level in September. Helium has remained above the 50-day and 25-day moving averages. It has also moved slightly above the middle line of the Andrew‚Äôs pitchfork tool. Therefore, a clear break above the resistance level at $9.52 will invalidate the triple-top pattern and point to more gains. If this happens, the next point to watch will be at $11, the year-to-date high, which is about 18% above the current level. A break above that level could see it rally to $20. Helium was co-founded in 2013 by CEO Amir Haleem, Napster founder Shawn Fanning, and CTO Sean Carey. Read more: MicroStrategy to join Nasdaq-100 Index following Bitcoin-driven stock surge

title: Project Garuda takes flight: First phase of Indonesia‚Äôs Digital Rupiah achieved
body: Bank Indonesia has completed the Proof of Concept (PoC) for its Wholesale Rupiah Digital Cash Ledger. This initiative advances the country‚Äôs Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) development through Project Garuda. Bank Indonesia Governor Perry Warjiyo announced that the central bank has completed the ‚ÄúImmediate State,‚Äù representing the first phase of the Rupiah Digital exploration journey. The development aligns with the bank‚Äôs mandate as Indonesia‚Äôs sole currency issuer and responds to the rapid growth of the digital financial economy. ‚ÄúThis achievement is a manifestation of Bank Indonesia‚Äôs commitment to the development of the Rupiah Digital in response to the rapid growth of the digital financial economy,‚Äù Warjiyo stated in the official report. According to Bank Indonesia economist Fransiskus Xaverius Tyas Prasaja , the PoC validated the required technical capabilities using distributed ledger technology (DLT). The testing phase showed that DLT-based solutions could effectively meet the requirements of the Rupiah Digital business model. You might also like: Bitcoin to $180k? Expect a 30% correction, warns VanEck The technical implementation involved testing across two DLT platforms: Corda, developed by R3, and Hyperledger Besu, developed by Kaleido. Both platforms were tested through 55 scenarios, focusing on three core business processes: issuance, redemption, and fund transfer. The PoC revealed that the DLT platforms successfully integrated with conventional systems using existing standards and the ISO 20022 standard. Smart contracts showed better transaction efficiency and flexibility for future Rupiah Digital development. The central bank‚Äôs whitepaper , ‚ÄúProject Garuda: Navigating the Rupiah Digital Architecture,‚Äù states two remaining phases ‚Äì the Intermediate State and End State ‚Äì in Indonesia‚Äôs CBDC development roadmap. The successful completion of this initial phase positions Indonesia among the growing number of nations actively advancing their digital currency initiatives. Bank Indonesia emphasizes that the Rupiah Digital will be integrated with existing payment systems and financial market infrastructure, supporting both domestic and cross-border transactions. The PoC results have identified key areas for further exploration, including privacy mechanisms, liquidity management protocols, and multi-validator deployment strategies. The development marks a crucial step toward Indonesia‚Äôs digital financial infrastructure advancement. Read more: MicroStrategy to join Nasdaq-100 Index following Bitcoin-driven stock surge

title: Bitcoin adoption unshaken despite Microsoft‚Äôs decision
body: The Bitcoin adoption wave appears unshaken by Microsoft‚Äôs shareholders‚Äô decision not the add the asset to its portfolio when they met as scheduled on December 10. Before the meeting, there was little optimism for a Bitcoin victory. The board of directors had already decided against adding the asset to the company‚Äôs balance sheet. If the proposal had been approved, it would have immediately sparked another wave of momentum for the asset. Aside from the asset seeing a likely surge in price, it would have also started another buying spree, one led by corporations this time. The surge would have also BTC, which is still sustaining a Trump-fuelled run to greater heights, creating a batch of new millionaires among the elites and retail traders alike. A new Bitcoin buying spree is on the horizon All indications point to a renewed Bitcoin buying spree in the crypto industry. With Microsoft deciding against the asset, firms and retailers are stepping up. According to the think tank in charge of Microsoft‚Äôs proposal The National Center for Public Policy Research, the next company that is thinking about adding BTC to its balance sheet is Amazon. Amazon shareholders have scheduled an April meeting to vote on a Bitcoin proposal. The shareholders will vote on a proposal similar to Microsoft‚Äôs, requesting the company to consider BTC as a treasury asset. With BTC above the $100,000 mark and the regulatory clarity the Trump administration promised the crypto industry, other companies might be looking to follow in this direction. With more shareholders also seeing the potential of the asset, they might be forced to call for a consensus to vote on their firms adopting Bitcoin. If the firms refuse, it could lead to backlash from shareholders and the public. It would be a case of shareholders urging the companies to invest in an asset that they approve. This will mean more firms may gravitate toward Bitcoin to boost shareholder value, a win for the cryptocurrency. Presently, the largest publicly traded companies holding Bitcoin have some affiliation with Bitcoin, including Coinbase Global and Microstrategy. Although there is an exception like in the case of Tesla. Most of them are buying Bitcoin because they need to, with Coinbase Global a typical example. The firm has an exchange where people buy and sell the asset. Effect on investors and BTC‚Äôs broader outlook While Microsoft‚Äôs decision is a setback in the wider adoption push, investors are hoping for a new set of corporations to push Bitcoin forward. For that to happen, the people outside the crypto industry need to see the asset as secure and worthy of long-term investment. In terms of profit, investors need a renewed surge of shareholder activism for Bitcoin adoption to recoup huge profits from the asset. In a recent talk held by the National Center for Public Policy Research, the think tank chose Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor to give a talk on why Microsoft needs to buy Bitcoin. In his speech, Saylor said that if Microsoft could purchase $100 million in BTC every year, it would push the market cap of the company to trillions. Meanwhile, there is a stronger argument for holding Bitcoin, as individual investors are still supporting the asset.¬†With support from Wall Street and, very soon, the White House, hope is on the horizon. A notable purchase by one of the tech titans in Silicon Valley could set off another buying spree. While Microsoft may have dashed investors‚Äô hopes by refusing to make a statement by voting for Bitcoin, Amazon will have its opportunity soon. From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

AMP historic price sentiment The AMP token was officially launched on September 11, 2020, with an initial price of $0.009. In its early months, AMP experienced a downward trend, hitting an all-time low of roughly $0.0007 on November 17 of the same year. AMP price history However, the token reversed its fortunes entering 2021. It surpassed its launch price, reaching a notable high of about $0.046 on February 14, 2021. The momentum continued, and by April 18, AMP‚Äôs price peaked at $0.064. AMP set new records, reaching a high of $0.077 on May 7, 2021, and then $0.12 on June 16, following its listing on the prominent cryptocurrency exchange, Coinbase. Despite these spikes, the overall trend for the rest of the year was bearish. By September 2021, AMP had fallen below the $0.05 mark as per crypto market data. In January 2022, AMP declined further to $0.02. The bear market proved challenging, and by June of that year, AMP‚Äôs price had fallen below its initial launch price. On September 7, it hit a 52-week low of $0.0054. In 2023, AMP attained a maximum price of $0.00642 and a minimum price of about $0.00146. Near the end of the year, AMP was trading at $0.0035. At the start of 2024, AMP gradually started its bullish cycle and reached $0.0056. On March 13, it peaked at $0.0129 before reversing. For May, June, and July, the AMP token continued its slow descent from the $0.0081 level to reach $0.0040, almost losing 40% of its value in three months. At the start of August 2024, AMP continued following the downtrend, reaching $0.0031, but made high spikes, leveling back to $0.00342 on August 25. In September 2024, the AMP token spiked as high as $0.00446 briefly, but in October AMP price dipped to the $0.00362 level. In November AMP touched $0.00800 mark, and is trading near $0.00734 at the start of December.

title: Crypto startups have attracted more than $1 billion in VC funding since Donald Trump‚Äôs election
body: Crypto startups have raised more than $1 billion in funding from venture capital firms since Donald Trump was elected President, according to data from Defillama. The new data showcases just how Trump‚Äôs victory has impacted crypto deal-making. Defillama data shows that VC funding for crypto startups in November was $796.41 million, while December is already at $511.48 million. Thus, the amount of funds raised by crypto startups in Q4 has already crossed $2 billion, more than the $1.7 billion that startups raised in Q3. VCs crypto investments since 2019. Source: Pitchbook While this marks a resurgence in crypto fundraising per quarter, it remains to be seen whether Trump‚Äôs momentum will be enough to make Q4 the biggest quarter for crypto startups in 2024. So far, Q1 has seen the biggest fundraising at $2.85 billion. Whether Q4 will beat that mark remains uncertain, but it looks to be on track. Nevertheless, VC interest in crypto remains low compared to the peak in 2022. Crypto startup fundraising peaked at $11.22 billion in Q1 of 2022. Since then, interest has declined due to the crypto industry‚Äôs struggles, including regulatory challenges. VCs bullish in expectation of regulatory clarity The rise in crypto funding is not completely surprising. It started in October and mirrors the general reaction of the crypto industry, first to the likelihood of Trump winning and, after the election, to his victory. With prices pumping and Bitcoin crossing $100,000, VCs are bullish on the crypto industry again and look forward to investing. This positive sentiment is fueled by the expected regulatory clarity that many believe the Trump administration will bring to the industry. With Trump already replacing the Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) chair Gary Gensler with a pro-crypto nominee and several pro-crypto people expected to join his cabinet, many believe the administration will allow the industry to thrive. Even crypto founders, including Solana‚Äôs co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko, have called on crypto startups to move to the US for the upside. Coinfund managing partner Chris Perkins also noted that regulatory overhaul will increase the number of startup deals. Perkins said: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs going to be a lot of cleanup. ‚Ä¶ People don‚Äôt realize how big a deal regulatory derisking is. It‚Äôs the biggest impediment to institutional adoption.‚Äù VCs are interested in other high-potential crypto sectors, such as tokenization, DeFi, stablecoins, infrastructure, and AI, which they consider the most attractive. Meanwhile, a few concerns remain about the Trump administration and whether he could achieve all his promises. This is not the first time that VCs and traditional finance have shown strong interest in the crypto sector, but many believe this episode will be different. For one, Trump appears very committed to achieving his pro-crypto plans and has a willing Congress backing him. Still, there are concerns that reality could fall below expectations. Avalanche and OG Foundation‚Äôs $250M raises lead Q4 deals Meanwhile, Layer-1 blockchain Avalanche is still the biggest raiser of Q4, receiving $250 million in a private, locked token sale led by Galaxy Digital, ParaFi Capital, and Dragonfly. Over 40 firms were involved in the token sale. Crypto-AI startup OG Foundation also raised $250 million in November in a token presale, while the affiliated developer OG Labs also raised $40 million in seed funding led by Hack VC, Delphi Digital, OKX Ventures, and Samsung Next. Beyond these two, most of the fundraising in this quarter has been for below $40 million, with Trump-backed World Liberty Financial raising $30 million, Klickl with $25 million, USDX Money with $45 million, and StakeStone with $22 million. Projects attracting investment fall into AI-crypto, real-world assets (RWA), DeFi, L1 and L2 networks, DePIN, and payments. title: Binance Founder Projects High-Scale Bitcoin Government Adoption in Ten Years
body: Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao pointed to increased government adoption of the asset in the next ten years. In an interview , he highlighted its use-case as the future of money to drive massive investment. This will increase the asset‚Äôs price as well as the wider crypto sentiment. Zhao hinted at more strategic Bitcoin reserves for countries to flip negative macro realities. Talks around a Bitcoin reserve in the United States gained momentum in the run-up to the U.S. Elections. With a rising national debt, crypto enthusiasts tip the asset to offset debt and promote finance and cross-border payments. A possible US backing could influence other jurisdictions to adopt the top crypto for payments and a reserve. After the U.S. election, the price of Bitcoin hit new milestones, shaking off previous corrections and setting the tone for positive projections. Trading above $100K, bulls set sights on a higher rally on the back of increased institutional adoption. These inflows to the asset could spike growth coupled with government adoption in the coming decade. Bitcoin‚Äôs Utility Over Gold Zhao highlighted the advantages Bitcoin (BTC) has over gold amid recent adoption. Bitcoin continues its upward trajectory backed by heavy institutional buys , with bulls projected over-the-top surges for the crypto leader in five years. Gold and Bitcoin are popular as a store of value for varying groups of investors with a decade-long debate on utilities. In a recent interview, Zhao noted that Bitcoin is more scarce, coupled with new use cases that could fuel its price. Bitcoin is termed digital gold because of its portability and access to a wider adoption net, which users say helps its case against precious metals. According to him, the scarcity of the asset will drive more investment in the coming years. On the other hand, the world doesn‚Äôt know the total supply of gold despite its availability for centuries. ‚ÄúI think it should be way more than that (a 16 trillion market cap), as you said it has many advantages over gold and gold is not a limited asset, people control the supply of gold by not mining and we don‚Äôt know how much they are. With Bitcoin, we know exactly how certain it is and there‚Äôs not a whole lot left.‚Äù CZ added.

title: On-Chain Analysts Water Down Ether Bulls $5,000 Price Expectations This Year
body: Crypto options platform Derive says the chances of Ethereum (ETH) hitting $5K by Dec 27 is less than 10%, falling from previous projections. The altcoin leader continues its sideways trading despite glimpses of a forward run through multiple resistance. Lower market sentiments have affected bulls significantly, as shown in recent whale movements out of the ecosystem. New market data released by the firm shows dwindling confidence for a $5K resistance level break. Currently, traders believe it only has an 8% chance of hitting the market despite increasing inflows to spot Ethereum ETFs . Steve Dawson, Derive‚Äôs head of research, noted a 17% chance of tapping the mark at its peak. Frequent price grips and corrections lowered Ethereum‚Äôs chances of hitting $5K. ETH stands at $3,702 at press time, 35% away from the much-anticipated target. Unlike Bitcoin and other altcoins like Solana , institutional flows didn‚Äôt help ETH this year. Ethereum Bulls May Defy Odds Although the price target is far up for most users, Ethereum Bulls projects a massive uptrend based on swinging macro factors. In a recent post on X (formerly Twitter), ETH contributor Eric Conner flagged the increasing inflow into ETH ETFs, tipping a supply-side crisis. Similarly, a crypto trader, Pentosh, noted that the network is changing in terms of inflow with little resistance to a new all-time high. ‚Äú Much like this thread with BTC, $ETH is having structural changes as well as the beginning of consistent and large ETF flows. It just put in a HH, and had it‚Äôs highest weekly close of the year. There is a not much resistance from here to ath, which should act as a magnet. Above that is clear skies,‚Äù he added. Investors Can Drive Optimism Although Ethereum has traded below expectations compared to standings with other altcoins , recent inflows could be a catalyst for growth in 2025. Last week, the asset‚Äôs funds saw the largest institutional flows, beating July‚Äôs high when spot ETH ETFs were approved. Data from CoinShares show products picked up $1.2 billion in inflows, a wide margin from other altcoins. A key point for institutional traders remains its staking capability and DeFi numbers. As crypto and web3 adoption soars, DeFi TVL is expected to hit new highs, driving investment in the space.

title: Crypto Hiring: Securitize, Galaxy, Hashdex add leaders
body: Securitize, Galaxy, and Hashdex each made significant leadership appointments this week as momentum continues to build across the crypto industry. Michael Sonnenshein became the chief operating officer of Securitize, the tokenization platform revealed this week. He had departed crypto asset manager Grayscale in May. Read more : Ex-Grayscale CEO shifts focus to tokenization Securitize is perhaps best known for helping BlackRock tokenize its USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund (BUIDL) in March. Backed by US Treasurys, the fund quickly grew to manage more than $500 million in assets. Sonnenshein told Blockworks in a Thursday interview that bringing real-world assets onchain is ‚Äúone of the most exciting frontiers in the broader blockchain and digital assets space.‚Äù While tokenized fiat currencies (aka stablecoins) are well-established, US Treasurys are the collateral serving as the ‚Äúsubstrate‚Äù for many capital markets transactions, Sonnenshein said. Read more: ‚ÄòGrowing investor appetite‚Äô in tokenized fund space: UBS ‚ÄúContinuing to build products that can address some of the inefficiencies and‚Ä¶move into offerings where the underlying assets are not dollars, but instead yield-bearing assets, I think is a very, very attractive value proposition,‚Äù he added. Galaxy also named Tony Paquette as its chief financial officer. He takes over for Alex Ioffe, who is set to move to a senior adviser role at the firm on Jan. 1. Paquette most recently held the CFO title at hedge fund firm Point72. Earlier in his career, he worked in Bank of America‚Äôs Corporate Investments Group and Treasury division, and held a head of funding and liability management role at JPMorgan Chase. Paquette then went on to oversee fintech company SoFi‚Äôs treasury, market risk, and regulatory and financial operations. In another notable people move this week, crypto-focused investment firm Hashdex appointed Mick McLaughlin as US head of distribution. His responsibilities will include growing the company‚Äôs US crypto ETFs . McLaughlin was formerly chief distribution officer at rival crypto asset manager Bitwise Asset Management. He also previously led Americas ETF distribution for Deutsche Bank and spent over a decade building the iShares business at BlackRock and Barclays. Meanwhile, Ethereum researcher Max Resnick announced his move to the Solana ecosystem , where he will join the research and development firm Anza after previously working at Consensys subsidiary Special Mechanisms Group. ‚ÄúIn my first 100 days, I plan on writing a spec for as much of the Solana protocol as I can get to, prioritizing fee markets and consensus implementations where I believe I can have the highest impact,‚Äù Resnick wrote in a Dec. 9 X post . title: Cardano (ADA) For $500B Market Cap? Analyst Shows That $3, $7, $14 Do Not Look Far
body: Dan Gambardello, a prominent cryptocurrency market analyst, has unveiled an optimistic forecast for Cardano (ADA) in the upcoming bull cycle. Gambardello believes that Cardano could achieve significant price milestones, including a $7 valuation and even a $14 peak, which would bring its market capitalization to an impressive $500 billion. This ambitious projection suggests an 11-fold increase from current levels, reflecting the analyst‚Äôs confidence in the unfolding supercycle. While bold, these predictions are grounded in Cardano‚Äôs historical performance and expanding ecosystem. The Cardano milestones of $3, $7, and $14 do not look far at all when you open up a daily chart. Super. Cycle. pic.twitter.com/NvSw0p7z4o ‚Äî Dan Gambardello (@cryptorecruitr) December 13, 2024 Recent Price Trends and Milestones At press time, Cardano (ADA) is trading at $1.12, marking a 0.24% drop in the past 24 hours. ADA needs to rise 177% from its current price to reach the $3.10 all-time high. Recent trends, however, demonstrate the asset‚Äôs capability for rapid growth. In November, the asset surged by 257%, climbing from $0.3214 to a two-year high of $1.1471. This performance suggests that reclaiming the $3 level may not be an overly ambitious goal for the cryptocurrency. To reach $7, the token would need a 525% price increase, resulting in a market capitalization of approximately $245 billion. On the other hand, achieving a $14 price target would necessitate a 1,150% gain, pushing the market cap to the half-trillion-dollar mark. Historical Performance Supports Optimism While a 1,150% increase may seem daunting, some Cardano supporters argue it is achievable based on the asset‚Äôs historical trends. For example, during the last bull market, ADA experienced a remarkable 17,364% increase from its cycle low to its all-time high. The token‚Äôs lowest point during the last cycle was $0.01913 in March 2020. By September 2021, ADA had surged to $3.161, marking a 164-fold increase in value. Proponents believe that the $14 target for this cycle may even be conservative, compared to its previous performance. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Factors Driving Optimism Beyond historical trends, the asset has made significant strides in development and partnerships, positioning itself for long-term growth. The network has recently formed alliances with major blockchain projects such as Bitcoin, Ripple, Stellar, and Dogecoin. Additionally, influential industry leaders, including Ripple‚Äôs Brad Garlinghouse and Stellar‚Äôs Jed McCaleb , have expressed support for Cardano (ADA). These partnerships and endorsements add credibility to its growth potential. Founder Charles Hoskinson has also announced plans to build a dedicated team to establish the asset as the leading platform for Bitcoin DeFi applications. Furthermore, the network is actively working with universities and governments, including initiatives in Argentina, to expand its influence and adoption. Potential to Surpass Ethereum With its expanding ecosystem, technological advancements, and growing support, analysts like Gambardello believe the digital asset could challenge Ethereum‚Äôs dominance in the blockchain space. While Ethereum has long been viewed as the market leader, Cardano‚Äôs supporters argue that its undervaluation presents significant upside potential. As the cryptocurrency market gears up for its next bull run, the token‚Äôs path to $7 and beyond will depend on market dynamics, adoption, and technological innovation. While the $14 projection remains ambitious, proponents view it as a realistic goal for the next cycle. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. Polkadot (DOT): A Protocol For Interoperable Blockchains Polkadot (DOT) is a decentralized protocol and cryptocurrency that allows secure communication between different blockchains without intermediaries. It enables the sharing of value and data across networks like Ethereum and Bitcoin. Polkadot employs parachains to enhance speed and scalability, processing more transactions than Bitcoin and Ethereum. The DOT token is used for governance and staking within the network, allowing holders to participate in its development and transaction verification. Developed by Gavin Wood, a co-creator of Ethereum, and launched on May 26, 2020, Polkadot aims to create more interconnected and efficient blockchains. With its technological approach, DOT may be considered attractive in the current market cycle. Cardano: A Sustainable Blockchain Platform with High Scalability Cardano is a blockchain platform designed for smart contracts, enabling decentralized finance apps, crypto tokens, and games. Its native cryptocurrency, ADA, allows users to store value, make payments, and stake on the network. Cardano uses the Ouroboros proof-of-stake mechanism, making it energy-efficient compared to proof-of-work models. The blockchain is divided into two layers: the Settlement Layer for transactions and the Computing Layer for smart contracts, enhancing its processing capability potentially up to 1,000,000 transactions per second. With the introduction of native tokens in March 2021, Cardano offers secure, low-fee interactions with smart contracts. Given its innovative technology and sustainable approach, ADA may be an attractive option in the current market cycle. Conclusion DOGEN is poised for significant gains, aiming for $5 before 2025.
